captions.text: We truly appreciate all your love and support towards Super Junior and SMTOWN
Today, let me introduce those two gentleman who will give lesson for the best choreography in this generation-
Eunhyuk of Super Junior
Donghae of Super Junior
Good. The choreography of MAMACITA is full of passion - the passion comes from Spanish Corrida de Toros and it also symbolizes Fencing
Let us slightly check out the Corrida de Toros in this choreography. okay. good
Yes, Corrida de Toros. Yeah.
Okay good. and what is the most inportant thing here?!
The passionate eyes!!
The eyes!!
The eyes!!
The eyes!! (INTENSE)
The eyes!! (CHARMING)
The starlights are falling down♪
Alright. This choreography will even more shine when you put full of your PASSION
*DANGER Idol's underwear is precious
Well then, let me introduce you the chorus part of MAMACITA
Very powerful and intense..
First, put your fencing swords up in the air strongly
How? Strongly!
*DANGER *Idol's underwear is precious
Once again
With your right hand, up in the air. Strongly!
Now, the second move.
Well, I believe this move can be very innovative exercise for men.
especially for developing their lower body
So let's check out the angle first.
Donghae's is doing it in wrong position now
The correct posture.
and the wrong one
Please keep those in mind
In this position... oh, your thigh hurts?
In this position, pop your shoulder
and twist your legs
The next move, put your hands up
and with shrank hands, hit your temple strongly
Let us show you one more time. Slowly..
(MAMACITA 0.5x version)
Sir! let's try again, sir
Our fans (E.L.F) are now watching and learning it
With a slow tempo version of MAMACITA,
(MAMACITA - even more slow version)
Dear all. Have you learned MAMACITA choreography well? :)
Well, then now it's time to see Super Junior's MAMACITA dance practice!

title: Super Junior The 7th Album ‘MAMACITA’ Music Video Event!! - MAMACITA Dance Tutorial
